allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 500km rainfall event with forecast overprediction

Implement a 500km-wide rainfall band that moves west-to-east alongside the existing heatwave. The rainfall event has peak observed values of 10-30mm/day.

Generate separate observation and forecast datasets where the forecast maintains the correct spatial pattern but overpredicts rainfall volume by approximately 40%.

Update the notebook with interactive variable and day selection controls, allowing users to easily switch between temperature and precipitation visualizations.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Change rainfall event to circular 250km radius pattern

Replace the 500km-wide rainfall band with a circular rainfall system \(250km radius\) that resembles a low-pressure system. The circular pattern moves west-to-east along latitude -27Â° \(central Australia\) while the heatwave continues to move as an elongated band.

This creates more realistic meteorological dynamics with a compact circular rainfall system alongside the broader heatwave pattern.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 9 additional meteorological variables with quick mock data

Implement simple mock data generation for 9 new variables using baseline + latitude gradient + noise approach. All variables now available in observation and forecast datasets.

New variables:
- tmin \(Daily Minimum Temperature\)
- rh \(Relative Humidity\)
- wind_avg, wind_gust \(Wind speeds\)
- pressure_sfc \(Surface Pressure\)
- geopotential_850/700/500/250 \(Geopotential heights\)

Update notebook with colormaps for all 11 variables. Dataset size now 76MB with complete meteorological coverage.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement meteorological dashboard with React

Features implemented:
- Data preprocessing script to convert Zarr to JSON \(6.8MB compressed\)
- React dashboard with Chakra UI \(Horizon UI-inspired design\)
- Zustand state management for global app state
- 3-column layout: controls \(left\), map \(center\), time series \(right\)
- HTML5 Canvas map visualization with color-coded gridded data
- Interactive point selection with click detection
- Time series chart using Recharts \(obs, forecast, difference\)
- Control panels: data type selector, variable selector, day slider
- 11 meteorological variables with variable-specific color scales
- Map legend with dynamic color gradients
- Australia boundary overlay

Tech stack:
- React 18 + Vite
- Chakra UI v2 for components and styling
- Zustand for state management
- Recharts for time series visualization
- chroma-js for scientific color scales
- pako for gzip decompression

Resolves #2

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
